resources.string: Your first step to a stress-free life
Please insert your info for a more personalized experience:
A simple way to improve your Day
Just follow this steps to start improving your daily mood
In the "Choose Device" page, select your Vital Jacket and hit the "Select" button. A message saying "Connected" should appear.
On the start of your day, press the "Start" button on your main page to start monitoring your stress
At the end of your day, press "Stop" in the same location
Evaluate your stress levels and leave a comment about what made you feel that way
Doing this on a constant bases will help you to better understand your thoughts and emotions throughout the day
With that, you will be able to control your stress when subjected to different everyday scenarios
You can also do a quick measure of your stress levels whenever you feel like it in the "Instant Measurement" page
The comments that you leave everyday will be stored in the "Log Book" page as well as the stress levels of that day, so that you can review them whenever you want
